languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс стоит рядом с вами — белый как мел, с расширенными глазами и гримасой на лице. Воздух вокруг него, кажется, бурлит — впрочем, феномен почти сразу пропадает. Когда дознаватель начинает говорить, его голос звучит хрипло и надтреснуто.{/n} "Это... было непросто".

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс стоит рядом с вами — бледный как мел, с расширенными глазами и гримасой на лице. Воздух вокруг него, кажется, бурлит — впрочем, феномен почти сразу пропадает. Когда дознаватель начинает говорить, его голос звучит хрипло и надтреснуто.{/n} "Это... было непросто".

languages.text: {n}Heinrix is standing beside you, white as a sheet, eyes wide, grimacing. The air around him seems to roil — though the phenomenon passes almost immediately. As he begins to speak, his voice sounds hoarse and cracked:{/n} "That... was not easy."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс стоит рядом с вами — белый как мел, с расширенными глазами и гримасой на лице. Воздух вокруг него, кажется, бурлит — впрочем, феномен почти сразу пропадает. Когда дознаватель начинает говорить, его голос звучит хрипло и надтреснуто.{/n} "Это... было непросто".

{n}Heinrix is standing beside you, white as a sheet, eyes wide, grimacing. The air around him seems to roil — though the phenomenon passes almost immediately. As he begins to speak, his voice sounds hoarse and cracked:{/n} "That... was not easy."

{n}Heinrix is standing beside you, white as a sheet, eyes wide, grimacing. The air around him seems to roil — though the phenomenon passes almost immediately. As he begins to speak, his voice sounds hoarse and cracked:{/n} "That... was not easy."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix está a tu lado, blanco como una sábana, con los ojos abiertos de par en par y una mueca en la cara. El aire parece arremolinarse a su alrededor, pero solo por un momento. Cuando habla, su voz parece ronca y cascada.{/n} «Eso... no ha sido fácil».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix is standing beside you, white as a sheet, eyes wide, grimacing. The air around him seems to roil — though the phenomenon passes almost immediately. As he begins to speak, his voice sounds hoarse and cracked:{/n} "That... was not easy."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix está a tu lado, blanco como una sábana, con los ojos abiertos de par en par y una mueca en la cara. El aire parece arremolinarse a su alrededor, pero solo por un momento. Cuando habla, su voz parece ronca y cascada.{/n} «Eso... no ha sido fácil».

languages.text: {n}おろしたてのシーツのように真っ白なハインリックスが隣に立ち、目を大きく見開いてニヤニヤしている。彼の周囲を覆う空気がざわめいたように見えたが、その現象もほぼすぐにおさまった。彼が話し始めると、かすれてひび割れたような声が聞こえてきた。{/n}「なかなか…大変でしたね」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix is standing beside you, white as a sheet, eyes wide, grimacing. The air around him seems to roil — though the phenomenon passes almost immediately. As he begins to speak, his voice sounds hoarse and cracked:{/n} "That... was not easy."

traits.locale_text: {n}おろしたてのシーツのように真っ白なハインリックスが隣に立ち、目を大きく見開いてニヤニヤしている。彼の周囲を覆う空気がざわめいたように見えたが、その現象もほぼすぐにおさまった。彼が話し始めると、かすれてひび割れたような声が聞こえてきた。{/n}「なかなか…大変でしたね」

languages.text: {n}海因里希站在你身边。他的脸色苍白如纸，眼睛大睁，表情痛苦。他周围的空气似乎在翻滚着，但随即恢复了平静。当海因里希开口时，他沙哑的声音颤抖着。{/n}“刚刚……很不容易。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix is standing beside you, white as a sheet, eyes wide, grimacing. The air around him seems to roil — though the phenomenon passes almost immediately. As he begins to speak, his voice sounds hoarse and cracked:{/n} "That... was not easy."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希站在你身边。他的脸色苍白如纸，眼睛大睁，表情痛苦。他周围的空气似乎在翻滚着，但随即恢复了平静。当海因里希开口时，他沙哑的声音颤抖着。{/n}“刚刚……很不容易。”

languages.text: {n}Heinrix se tient près de vous. Son visage blanc comme un linge est fendu d'une grimace. L'air autour de lui semble s'agiter, mais le phénomène se dissipe rapidement. Il commence à parler d'une voix rauque.{/n} « Voilà qui n'a pas... été une partie de plaisir. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix is standing beside you, white as a sheet, eyes wide, grimacing. The air around him seems to roil — though the phenomenon passes almost immediately. As he begins to speak, his voice sounds hoarse and cracked:{/n} "That... was not easy."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix se tient près de vous. Son visage blanc comme un linge est fendu d'une grimace. L'air autour de lui semble s'agiter, mais le phénomène se dissipe rapidement. Il commence à parler d'une voix rauque.{/n} « Voilà qui n'a pas... été une partie de plaisir. »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix steht neben dir, weiß wie ein Laken, die Augen weit aufgerissen, das Gesicht zur Fratze verzerrt. Die Luft um ihn herum scheint zu brodeln, doch das Phänomen verschwindet fast augenblicklich wieder. Als er zu sprechen beginnt, klingt seine Stimme heiser und krächzend.{/n} "Das ... war nicht leicht."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix is standing beside you, white as a sheet, eyes wide, grimacing. The air around him seems to roil — though the phenomenon passes almost immediately. As he begins to speak, his voice sounds hoarse and cracked:{/n} "That... was not easy."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix steht neben dir, weiß wie ein Laken, die Augen weit aufgerissen, das Gesicht zur Fratze verzerrt. Die Luft um ihn herum scheint zu brodeln, doch das Phänomen verschwindet fast augenblicklich wieder. Als er zu sprechen beginnt, klingt seine Stimme heiser und krächzend.{/n} "Das ... war nicht leicht."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix; beti benzi atmış, gözleri çivilenmiş hâlde yanında duruyor. Etrafındaki hava âdeta çalkalanıyor, hemen sonra ise bu garip durum normale dönüyor. Konuşmaya başladığında sesi boğuk ve çatlak çıkıyor.{/n} "Hiç... Kolay olmadı."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix is standing beside you, white as a sheet, eyes wide, grimacing. The air around him seems to roil — though the phenomenon passes almost immediately. As he begins to speak, his voice sounds hoarse and cracked:{/n} "That... was not easy."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix beti benzi atmış, gözleri çivilenmiş bir hâlde yanında duruyor. Etrafındaki hava âdeta çalkalanıyor, hemen sonra ise bu garip durum normale dönüyor. Konuşmaya başladığında sesi boğuk ve çatlak çıkıyor:{/n} “Hiç... Kolay değildi.”
